bug.author: MwC-Trexx
bug.summary: moments: near \"INNER\": syntax error (update folder dates) & (update album dates)
bug.description:
I have created a docker container on a QNAP NAS running the latest version of their Container Station ("docker") platform. When I am doing an import of photo's, I am seeing these errors flagged in the log. <denchmark-code>time="2020-12-10T03:08:04+08:00" level=error msg="moments: near \"INNER\": syntax error (update folder dates)" time="2020-12-10T03:08:04+08:00" level=error msg="moments: near \"INNER\": syntax error (update album dates)" time="2020-12-10T03:08:04+08:00" level=info msg="Import completed in 34 s" </denchmark-code>
Let me know what additional information you may need to troubleshoot this.

comments.comment: Should be fixed with the next build. Only affected SQLite. Disabled the query there until we have a working alternative.

What database are you using?
Embedded SQLite
